headline: 3 Reasons PCAR is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, PACCAR’s stock price fell to $92.01. Shareholders have lost 12.1% of their capital, disappointing when considering the S&P 500 was flat. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
